briefTitle: Mini-Allogeneic Peripheral Blood Progenitor Cell Transplantation For Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Mini-Allogeneic Peripheral Blood Progenitor Cell Transplantation For Recurrent or Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participants With Tumor Response
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Recurrent or residual metastatic breast carcinoma
* Zubrod performance status less than 2
* 18-60 years old
* Related donor human leukocyte antigen (HLA)-compatible for allogeneic transplantation or unrelated HLA-compatible donor.
* No major organ dysfunction or active infection

Exclusion Criteria: None
